mapper.insert: insert into TEServedPersonForeigner (ForeignerID, ServedPersonID, FamilyName, FirstName, ChineseName, Sex, BirthDate, Nationality, ReligiousBelief, CertificateCode, CertificateNumber, CertificateDueDate, Contact, PurposeTypeValue, CareerType, Career, ServedPlace, PresentAddress, PresentAddressDetail, ArrivalDate, EstimatedDepartureDate, IsFocusPerson, VisaDeadline) values (#{foreignerID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{servedPersonID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{familyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{nationality,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{religiousBelief,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{certificateCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{certificateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateDueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purposeTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{careerType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{career,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{servedPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{presentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{presentAddressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrivalDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{estimatedDepartureDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isFocusPerson,jdbcType=BIT}, #{visaDeadline,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update TEServedPersonForeigner set ServedPersonID = #{servedPersonID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FamilyName = #{familyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FirstName = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ChineseName = #{chineseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BirthDate = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, Nationality = #{nationality,jdbcType=CHAR}, ReligiousBelief = #{religiousBelief,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CertificateCode = #{certificateCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CertificateNumber = #{certificateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CertificateDueDate = #{certificateDueDate,jdbcType=DATE}, Contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PurposeTypeValue = #{purposeTypeValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, CareerType = #{careerType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Career = #{career,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ServedPlace = #{servedPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PresentAddress = #{presentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PresentAddressDetail = #{presentAddressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ArrivalDate = #{arrivalDate,jdbcType=DATE}, EstimatedDepartureDate = #{estimatedDepartureDate,jdbcType=DATE}, IsFocusPerson = #{isFocusPerson,jdbcType=BIT}, VisaDeadline = #{visaDeadline,jdbcType=DATE} where ForeignerID = #{foreignerID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ForeignerID, ServedPersonID, FamilyName, FirstName, ChineseName, Sex, BirthDate, Nationality, ReligiousBelief, CertificateCode, CertificateNumber, CertificateDueDate, Contact, PurposeTypeValue, CareerType, Career, ServedPlace, PresentAddress, PresentAddressDetail, ArrivalDate, EstimatedDepartureDate, IsFocusPerson, VisaDeadline from TEServedPersonForeigner where ForeignerID = #{foreignerID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ForeignerID, ServedPersonID, FamilyName, FirstName, ChineseName, Sex, BirthDate, Nationality, ReligiousBelief, CertificateCode, CertificateNumber, CertificateDueDate, Contact, PurposeTypeValue, CareerType, Career, ServedPlace, PresentAddress, PresentAddressDetail, ArrivalDate, EstimatedDepartureDate, IsFocusPerson, VisaDeadline from TEServedPersonForeigner
select OrgMemberID from TEServedPersonForeigner where ChineseName=#{name} and CertID=#{certID}

select ForeignerID, ServedPersonID, FamilyName, FirstName, ChineseName, Sex, BirthDate, Nationality, ReligiousBelief, CertificateCode, CertificateNumber, CertificateDueDate, Contact, PurposeTypeValue, CareerType, Career, ServedPlace, PresentAddress, PresentAddressDetail, ArrivalDate, EstimatedDepartureDate, IsFocusPerson from TEServedPersonForeigner where CertifID = #{certifID}
